insert into t_dx_submit_qutstanding_report ( datet, input_user, jv, vendor_no, inv_no, invoice_cost, wm_cost, batch_id, po_no, trans, rece, errcode, errdesc, errstatus, invoice_date
)values( getdate(), #{entity.inputUser}, #{entity.jv}, #{entity.vendorNo}, #{entity.invNo}, #{entity.invoiceCost}, #{entity.wmCost}, #{entity.batchId}, #{entity.poNo}, #{entity.trans}, #{entity.rece}, #{entity.errcode}, #{entity.errdesc}, #{entity.errstatus}, #{entity.invoiceDate} )
